channel.title: The runescape password database has been breeched!
channel.description:
Oh, sorry for the alarming title, but I want to hear what you would do if a Jagex employee unencrypted and posted the full username and password databases to every account on a site such as Mopar :P. What would you do? Who would you hack? What would be the effect? Would Runescape come to an end? Discuss.
I figured this belonged in discussion rather than Runescape, because I want it to be discussed ;)
I think this would probably ruin Runescape, but until then I wouldn't focus on hacking the top players, I would hack people who deserved it, people who were cruel to me, or decieved me.

item.title: The runescape password database has been breeched!

@Ca1lum wrote:

Well i would run around the house yelling Words not allowed on here then race back to my PC and copy the file and make JAGEX pay for the crap they put me through and spam there forums with haha i know all your pass words and prove it by takeing everything from every one who said i was lieng.

Im 15 years old

Read full topic

item.title: The runescape password database has been breeched!
item.dc:creator: @Dukly Dukly
item.description:
@Dukly wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:3, topic:31595”]I would 1) paste the database to my own little rsdatabase.txt file
2) delete the post.[/quote]

LMAO!..

And assuming you have plenty of bandwidth left, and a fast connection to download the file, but the server also plays a LARGE part with its SMALL upload. And 256/128 just isnt going to get it done, 512/256 might, but i would say atleast 1024/512 to get it done, and the server would need like 20mb/s up, considering there would be a ton of people trying to download it at around 700-1024kb/s

Read full topic

item.title: The runescape password database has been breeched!
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

Well we aren’t worried about size, we are worried about how long the list would take to download. Of course our computers have the space. The question is: Will we be able to download the list before it is removed?

Read full topic
item.source: The runescape password database has been breeched!

item.title: The runescape password database has been breeched!
item.dc:creator: @newguy45 newguy45
item.description:
@newguy45 wrote:

jimmy0s:

Well yes, it does depend on the length. If you assume every username is 12 characters, the max limit, and every password is 20 letters long, the max also, then it would be 35 bytes per. Thats 350,000,000 byes.

my computer is relativity old and it has 120 gigs, 334 mb wouldn’t make me loose any sleep…

Read full topic
